title: A brief question for Riot about the Jhin and his impact on the lore of League.
body: Did jhin 'actually' kill Garen/Sona/Zed and Vi in the 'lore' of the game? or are they all still alive, since from my understanding, most of the trailers and events you throw at us with videos and content tend to be directly related to the story, are we playing champs that are technically dead? Something like Kindred where, we dont know if she's real or not because she's based off of a fairy tail told by others, could we be playing champions who are 'recreated' in the rift from their past history/tales of them and what not? i just thought it interesting since, because of the way time and space seem to work in the Rift, it makes me believe that they are just "Figments of their ideals" when they were alive. Just a thought i had recently.

replies.body:
He didn't kill them. That was all a promo done for the purpose of hyping Jhin. He'd potentially go out of his way to kill Zed or Sona sure, especially Zed, but Garen and Vi? Nah not directly anyway. Those four are fine. 

For now.

God damn if he comes anywhere near Sona I'ma break his arms so fast.
Precisely. And that includes Sona-related limb snapping. Sona made me a support main.

Well he might be ordered by the ionian council to kill Garen if they see him as a threat.

Vi seems a bit more random though,maybe Jhin will simply take an interest in her,I mean he is known to kill people on a whim if he wants to(like that maid from his color-text)
I personally would love to see the lore of characters get expanded upon with a dramatic death caused by Jhin haha. I feel like the ones with the most impact would be Garen/Draven/Jayce or Karma.
The problem here is wanting riot to do lore.

He was visualizing their deaths in his own gory, twisted fantasy.
It isn't actual reality... yet.
The teaser was seeing from his point of view what killing them would look like. Jhin sees beauty in death, and that's what the trailer showed.
Kled is another example of a character that doesn't actually exist in that world he is just a legit meme from noxus.

I'm pretty sure he does exist,as we actually get a lorepiece where a noxian noble sends his men to claim Kleds turf as his own.

Sure Kled is a meme,a legend for the noxians,but he is a living legend.

Everything could be a mere illusion.
One thing is sure.
Urgot lives.
